message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $14,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I can only afford to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I appreciate you recognizing the value of the product. While $14,000 is my ideal price, I'm willing to come down to $12,000. I believe that's a fair compromise.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still not able to go above $10,000 for the product. Would $11,000 be acceptable to you?
